alert.note: Alert for Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:21PM MDT until July 22 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TURNER COUNTY... At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Viborg, or 13 miles south of Parker, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 610 PM CDT, 1 inch hail was reported 3 miles southwest of Hurley. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Viborg around 625 PM CDT. Centerville around 640 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
